title: Serious Team LF Plat+ Jungler
body:
**Introduction**

Hi my name is Akon and currently my team is looking for a serious jungle main. Of course you'll be required to take this team seriously, show up to practices on time, and follow the meta. We also expect you to be to give and take constructive criticism. If for whatever reason you cannot make a practice please let me know a day beforehand or as soon as possible. We're also not interested in ragers or toxic players.

**Schedule**

Our schedule varies because we update our schedule every Sunday by 11pm EST for the following week. We usually play in between 8:30pm and 12am EST.

**Prerequisites**

- Must be at least Plat 5 
- Must main Jungle
- Must have good communication
- Must have Discord
- Must follow/adapt to the meta
- Play games outside of scheduled practices
- Have a good personality

**Champ Pool**

Although I don't expect you to know ALL of these champs right away, I expect you to know at least 5 of them: 

{{champion:60}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:154}} 

**Application**: 

IGN -
Rank -
Top 5 Champs (In order) -
List at least 5 champs that you know how to play from the list above -
Strengths -
Weaknesses -
Why do you want to join this team/what do you want to achieve from joining this team? -
Why should we pick you? -

replies.body:
IGN - AaronDLy

Rank - Diamond  3

Top 5 champs - I can play all at the same level, which isn't top tier but can improve.

Strengths-  N/A

Weaknesses- N/A

Reason: I'm looking for a serious team thats willing to get better. 

Pick: N/A

IGN - freelo boyz
Rank - d5
Top 5 Champs (In order) - lee olaf graves zac elise
List at least 5 champs that you know how to play from the list above - all
Strengths - ganking
Weaknesses - greed
Why do you want to join this team/what do you want to achieve from joining this team? -  we will see
Why should we pick you? - cuz freelo

IGN - 
Remas

Rank - 
Plat 1

Champs I know how to play from the list above - 
Elise, Graves, Hecarim, Olaf, Lee Sin, Sejuani, Zac

Strengths - 
1. Knowing where the enemy jungler is located about 80% of the time.
2. Fast learner.
3. Good vision control.
4. Stealing dragon and baron.

Weaknesses - 
1. Sometimes will go auto-pilot. (Not playing 100%)
2. Dragon control.

-I want to join your team because I like being competitive especially when I have a team to climb with me. What I want to get out of joining the team is becoming a better player at the game and having fun.

- You should pick me because I have experience with competitive play with a tournament I was in last year. I was the shot caller of my HSL (High School Star League) team in which we got 3rd place in our bracket of 30+ teams.
- I have also played ranked team a lot in past seasons but not as much in season.
- I am not toxic and I do not rage.
- I love constructive criticism.
